text: Thus says Yahweh: “For three transgressions of Moab and for four I will not revoke \add the punishment\add*,\f + \fr 2:1 \ft Or “it” \f* because he burned to lime the bones of the king of Edom.
So I will send a fire against Moab and it will devour the citadel fortresses of Kerioth, and Moab will die amid uproar, amid war cries \add and\add* amid the sound of a horn.
And I will cut off \add the\add* ruler from its midst and I will kill all of its officials with him,” says Yahweh.

Thus says Yahweh: “For three transgressions of Judah and for four I will not revoke \add the punishment\add*,\f + \fr 2:4 \ft Or “it” \f* because they have rejected the law of Yahweh and have not kept his rules, and their lies have led them astray, ⸤after which their ancestors walked⸥!\f + \fr 2:4 \ft Literally “which their ancestors walked after them” \f*
So I will send a fire against Judah and it will devour the citadel fortresses of Jerusalem.

Thus says Yahweh: “For three transgressions of Israel and for four I will not revoke \add the punishment\add*,\f + \fr 2:6 \ft Or “it” \f* because they sell the righteous for money and the poor for a pair of sandals!

Those who trample the heads of the powerless into the dust of the ground and turn aside the way of the destitute, a man and his father ⸤have sexual relations with⸥\f + \fr 2:7 \ft Literally “go to” \f* the same girl, so that \add they\add* profane my holy name.
They stretch themselves out beside every altar on clothing taken in pledge and they drink wine, bought with fines imposed,\f + \fr 2:8 \ft Literally “imposing a fine” \f* in the house of their God.

Yet I destroyed the Amorite ⸤before them⸥,\f + \fr 2:9 \ft Literally “from the face of them” \f* ⸤who was as tall as⸥\f + \fr 2:9 \ft Literally “whose height was as the height of” \f* cedars and was as strong as the oaks. I destroyed his fruit above and his roots beneath.
And I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and I led you in the wilderness forty years to take possession of the land of the Amorite.

And I raised up some \add of\add* your sons to \add be\add* prophets and some \add of\add* your young men to \add be\add* Nazirites. Is it not so, O ⸤people⸥\f + \fr 2:11 \ft Literally “children” \f* of Israel? \add This is\add* the declaration of Yahweh!
But you made the Nazirites drink wine and commanded the prophets, saying, ‘You shall not prophesy.’
Look! I \add am\add* going to press \add you\add* down in your place just as a utility cart full of mature stalks of grain \add is pressed down\add*.
Flight will perish from \add the\add* swift and \add the\add* strong person will not muster his strength and \add the\add* warrior will not save his life.
And \add the\add* one who takes hold of the bow will not stand and \add the one who is\add* swift on his feet will not save himself, nor will \add the\add* one who rides the horse save his life.
Even those who are strong of heart among the mighty will flee away naked from the city on that day. \add This is\add* the declaration of Yahweh!”
